perturbation.original_text: Ehave warrants that for the duration of the Term, (i) the Ehave Companion Solution will substantially conform to and operate in accordance with, and have the functions and features set out in, the Specifications, and any related documentation provided by Ehave, and any such documentation shall be complete and accurate in all material respects; and the Ehave Companion Solution will not contain any material undocumented feature; (ii) Ehave has implemented and will maintain industry standard protection for the detection, protection and removal of Viruses; (iii) Ehave will perform all services under this Agreement in a timely, professional and workmanlike manner using personnel of required skill, experience and qualifications, and will devote adequate resources to meet its obligations (including the Service Level Commitments and its support obligations) hereunder; (iv) it has or will have all necessary right, power and authority, including all licenses and Intellectual Property Rights required, to provide and operate the Ehave Companion Solution and to grant all rights and licenses granted or required to be granted by it under this Agreement; and (v) Ehave is not aware of any infringement or misappropriation claims by any third party in relation to the Ehave Companion Solution.
perturbation.changed_text: Ehave warrants that for the duration of the Term, (ii) Ehave has implemented and will maintain industry standard protection for the detection, protection and removal of Viruses; (iii) Ehave will perform all services under this Agreement in a timely, professional and workmanlike manner using personnel of required skill, experience and qualifications, and will devote adequate resources to meet its obligations (including the Service Level Commitments and its support obligations) hereunder; (iv) it has or will have all necessary right, power and authority, including all licenses and Intellectual Property Rights required, to provide and operate the Ehave Companion Solution and to grant all rights and licenses granted or required to be granted by it under this Agreement; and (v) Ehave is not aware of any infringement or misappropriation claims by any third party in relation to the Ehave Companion Solution.
perturbation.explanation: By removing clause (i), the contract no longer explicitly warrants that the Ehave Companion Solution will conform to the Specifications. However, other sections, such as Section 6(f)(i), reference the Specifications, creating an inconsistency. This omission leads to uncertainty about the required functionality and features of the solution and uncertainty in enforcement, as CHT may claim the system does not conform to agreed-upon specifications, but the explicit warranty is missing.

perturbation.original_text: CHT will provide Ehave and its representatives, auditors and inspectors ("Auditors") upon ten (10) Business Days prior written notice with reasonable access, during business hours, to all facilities, systems and assets used by CHT, to CHT personnel and subcontractors and to all relevant CHT books and records, in each case, to the extent relevant to this Agreement, in order to conduct appropriate audits, examinations and inspections ("Audits") to: (i) verify compliance with the requirements set out in this Agreement; and (ii) verify the Royalty calculations.
perturbation.changed_text: CHT will provide Ehave and its representatives, auditors and inspectors ("Auditors") upon ten (10) Business Days prior written notice with reasonable access, during business hours, to all facilities, systems and assets used by CHT, to CHT personnel and subcontractors and to all relevant CHT books and records, in each case, to the extent relevant to this Agreement, in order to conduct appropriate audits, examinations and inspections ("Audits") to: (ii) verify the Royalty calculations.
perturbation.explanation: By removing clause (i), the audit rights are limited only to verify Royalty calculations. However, Section 8(d) mentions security audits. This creates a contradiction: there's a reference to a security audit, but the clause enabling the overall compliance audit is gone.

perturbation.original_text: The Royalties and payment terms are as set out in Schedule "6". The Royalties do not include applicable taxes. CHT agrees to pay the Royalties and applicable taxes in accordance with the payment terms as set out in Schedule "6".
perturbation.changed_text: CHT agrees to pay the Royalties and applicable taxes.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the reference to 'Schedule 6', the specifics around royalties and payment terms are removed. Section 17(c)(iv) mentions CHT's payment obligations under Section 7. But now without 'Schedule 6' defining the Royalties and payments terms, any obligation around the value and timing for payments becomes ambigious. This creates a contradiction as there is no clear information about the Royalties
